Class ClickContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.xemiru.sponge.boxboy.util.ClickContext

  • public class ClickContext
extends Object
    Provides information about an attempt to press a Button in a Menu.

      • getCursor

        public Optional<ItemStack> getCursor()
        Returns:

      • getNewCursor

        public Optional<ItemStack> getNewCursor()
        Returns:
        the ItemStack to be set on the cursor

      • setNewCursor

        public void setNewCursor(ItemStack item)
        Sets the ItemStack to be set on the cursor.

        Setting this to null will not clear the item on the cursor. An ItemStack containing the AIR item type should instead be provided for a similar effect.

        Parameters:
        item - the item to set
